reassembled

23 Jul 2007 I reassembled my frame last saturday, but couldn't upload the pictures untill now because the webserver was down :(

[G2:11554]

Notice how the frame is bent a little on the left side. I have no idea why that is, but I hope it won't cause any trouble.

[Update 20070727]
crashmann on the TK560 forums recognizes this as "barrel distortion". It means my frame is not bent after all :)
